OOC: All right, This is going to be a really big post because I am 
going to Alberta for a week and a half.  I may post while i am there 
if i can but I am leaving all my autobots and chivtrons to rAuq. 
Rdahl, if you may, take care of the D.E.D members and FireStrike.  I 
will make sure to inform you guys if I will post while i am there, so 
as not to confuse Jer.  

Here it goes....

::Grounded/Seekker/FireStrike/JetV/Crotale/Repugnus/Slag/Dreadwind/ 
Darkwing/Needlenose/Scrapper/Quake/Havotron::

Grounded smiled at Nightlight. "Yes, Nightlight please do. Then 
gather Windlord and Aerotaur and get them to meet me in the 
Conference Room." Grounded walked to the conference room.

Seekker continued to balst his engine as Axis pulled the pod back.

FireStrike looked at Nightstrike with hate in his 
eyes.  "Nightstrike, quit your bickering to Megatron, you will simply 
distract him.  He is a great leader and will not need our help.  Not 
shut up and stand to attention, for when Megatron defeats this 
weakling."

JetV looked to the controls of the ship.  Hitting a button the engins 
fired up kicking flame back 20 meters out of the rear 
engines.  "Pacifix, the engines are warmed up and ready to go."

Crotale felt the surge as the engines started the plasma flow through 
the engine.  They were almost gone then he could show himelf to his 
best friend.

Repugnus let out a small smile as the ship surged.  Finally he 
thought ' maybe there will be others like me'.

Slag smiled at his leader.  "Yes,  Ironhide make bots weak.  Dinobots 
like us make bots strong."

Dreadwind and Darkwing arrived at a Energon Pub called Jer's Jome 
Pub.  They walked in and looked around.  All seemed to be Ex-
Deceptiocons from the Great War.  
Dreadwind spoke.  "All Decepticons.  The ship to finish the Autobots 
as they leave is complete.  And Decepticons still wishing to fight 
under the greatest leader Cybertron has ever seen, Havotron, speak 
now."
Darkwing mumbled out " or don't, then die!"

One bot at the side stood. Clearly overenergized and stumbling into 
things announced "I will, a huiuiuc.....fight for Havotruiiic..up"  
He stumbled over to Darkwing and Dreadwind and fell on the ground. 

Darkwing said "Grab him. We will use him."

"where is Apeface?" Dreadwind asked.  "We need to find Sluggy and get 
out of here."  They waited for Apeface to catch up.

Needlenose flew into the ship dockyard.  The ship was huge and filled 
with weapons.  "Wow."

Havotron came in behind.  "Spinister.  Gather the D.E.D.  I will make 
my leadeer speech now for we will be leaving momentarly.  Needlenose. 
Go start the engines."

"umm, how exactly will i do that sir?" he asked. 

"FIND OUT" Havotron yelled .  Needlenose ran into the ship looking 
for the control center.

Scrapper saw Needlenose. "Something I can help you with."

Needle explained what he had to do.  Scrapper turned around and 
touched a wall panel.  The panel opend and inside was the control 
center. "This is the most defensible base ship ever made" he 
explained. "To one who did not know, the ship would justseem like al 
ong hallway.  "
With the touch of a button the engines roared to life.

Havotron waited unpatietnly for the rest of his D.E.D members to 
gather.

OOC:Rdahl and rAuq. I will send a email with my master plans to 
overthrow Yanshosh Incorporated and take my rightful seat as ruler of 
the free world. I mean, umm, you know the rpg plans. yea thats it. 
ummm yea... Quick security kill them, don't let my secret out.
